General.Name: Leo Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Leo Group Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and sells pumps and garden machinery products in China. The company offers small water pumps, lawn mowers, pasture equipment, motors, chippers, and other products; and digital marketing services. Its products are widely used in agriculture and forestry irrigation, urban water supply, building HVAC, firefighting, water conservancy, chemical, energy, metallurgy, mining, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Leo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Leo Group Co., Ltd. in April 2013. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Wenling, China.
General.Address: Oriental International Yuanzho Bldg A, Shanghai, China, 200063
